name: Points In Space 2018.003
description: “The time I think most clearly, the time I drift away, Is on the bus-ride that meanders up these valleys of green and grey.” (Heaton/Sullivan 1987) Green and Grey - New Model Army. ----- Scan of a hand drawn pointillist drawing made with archival ink on paper. The drawing was started on a bus ride from Huddersfield to Bradford and back. PNG 2420 x 1658 PX. 2018
